about.subtitle: ABOUT
about.title: SIAM SPA
about.text: Welcome to SIAM SPA — your home of relaxation and rejuvenation. Experience the art of Thai wellness through our professional therapists, soothing aromas, and peaceful ambiance created for your ultimate comfort.

service.title: PRECISION HEAD SPA SOLUTIONS
service.subtitle: Because beauty deserves the best
service.text: Our specialized head spa treatments are designed to stimulate blood circulation, relieve stress, and restore your hair health to its full vitality.

quotes.text1: Every pressure point, every touch, every preference of yours is analyzed to create a personalized treatment that not only relaxes your muscles but also restores balance to your body and inner calm effectively.
quotes.text2: Behind every touch lies a meticulous process. We experiment and select the best products in each category, and we continuously research new knowledge to provide services that create sustainable results. We strive to find options that are not just “good enough” but truly exceptional.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Because your peace deserves precision
whyChooseUs.text: We believe relaxation is an art that requires meticulous care. Every touch is an experience designed for you, with professional staff and premium products to deliver the best results for your body and mind.

hero.title: CONTACT SIAM SPA
hero.subtitle: WE’RE HERE FOR YOU
hero.text: Need help booking your spa experience or have questions about our treatments? Our friendly staff are just a message away. Feel free to reach out — we’re delighted to help you unwind and feel your best.
